title: GENERAL
fullText:
The voltage rating of the PV input of the PCE shall be at least the voltage of the circuit they will be fitted to according to Clause 4.2.1.3.

The current rating of the PV input of the PCE (ISC PV) shall be at least the current rating of the circuit they will be fitted to according to Clause 4.2.2.

NOTE The suitability of the PCE with an integrated load break disconnection device is also dependant on temperature related installation conditions, see Clause 4.5.3.2.
